remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法給顯示裝置的繪圖。The class provides methods for drawing to the display device. 之類的類別和封裝 GDI + 基本類型。Classes such as and encapsulate GDI+ primitives. 類別用來繪製的直線和曲線，衍生自抽象類別的類別時用來填滿的圖案內部。The class is used to draw lines and curves, while classes derived from the abstract class are used to fill the interiors of shapes. > [!CAUTION] > 類別內命名空間不支援使用 Windows 或 ASP.NET 服務中。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service. 嘗試使用這些類別時，這些應用程式類型的其中一個內可能會產生無法預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務的效能和執行階段例外狀況。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 支援的替代方案，請參閱[Windows 影像處理元件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ee719654\(v=vs.85\).aspx)。For a supported alternative, see [Windows Imaging Components](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ee719654\(v=vs.85\).aspx).
